parameters.name: Object
parameters.description: Face , body , feature , component , or part to which to apply a copied appearance; if Null, the copied appearance is applied to an entity that is pre-selected in the graphics area

parameters.name: AppearanceTarget
parameters.description: Appearance target type as defined in swAppearanceTargetType_e ; only valid if Object is a face

title: ISldWorks.PasteAppearance
description: Applies to the specified entity an appearance that has been copied to the clipboard.
signature:
System.Boolean PasteAppearance( 
   System.Object
Object
,
   System.Int32
AppearanceTarget
)

parameters.name: Object
parameters.description: Face , body , feature , component , or part to which to apply a copied appearance; if Null, the copied appearance is applied to an entity that is pre-selected in the graphics area

parameters.name: AppearanceTarget
parameters.description: Appearance target type as defined in swAppearanceTargetType_e ; only valid if Object is a face

returns: True if the copied appearance is successfully applied, false if not
